control_light_activity::clip_card_0::goa: Practice controlling light by changing your angle or your exposure.
control_light_activity::text_card_1::tex: Congratulations on completing Mobile Photo 101! Don't forget to share your photos with the StoryMaker community by tagging them #StoryMakerPics
control_light_activity::title: Control Light Activity
control_light_activity::text_card_0::tex: Now that you've finished the lesson on controlling light, this lesson will help you practice.
control_light_activity::text_card_2::tex: You can return home by hitting the back button next to the StoryMaker icon at the top of your screen.
